reason: The market is exhibiting cautious accumulation. While Bitcoin shows resilience with a 1% rise and privacy tokens rally, significant regulatory tightening (India, stablecoin debate) and macro uncertainty (Trump-Powell feud) present considerable headwinds. The high risk score reflects ongoing regulatory pressure and potential systemic concerns, warranting a watchful approach despite underlying demand for certain crypto niches. The market is consolidating as it digests conflicting signals.
headlines: India tightens crypto rules to fight money laundering and terror funding
Bitcoin rises 1%, Nasdaq futures and dollar drop as Trump-Powell feud escalates
Privacy tokens rally as XMR breaks all-time high
Prediction markets downplay Powell exit risk despite DOJ probe: Asia Morning Briefing
JPMorgan downplays stablecoin threat as local bankers warn of $6.6 trillion risk
